channel.title: CVE Feed for Puppet -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Puppet -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-2530|2024-08-02T06:26:09.676Z -- puppet -- puppet%20enterprise
item.description: A privilege escalation allowing remote code execution was discovered in the orchestration service.

item.title: CVE-2023-1894|2024-08-02T06:05:26.999Z -- puppet -- puppet%20enterprise
item.description: A Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) issue was discovered in Puppet Server 7.9.2 certificate validation. An issue related to specifically crafted certificate names significantly slowed down server operations.
